data.text: Happy Independence Day Grenada! #iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/LVnxKhc6KV

Last May, we made history with our inaugural cargo-only charter flight followed by shipments of 159 dairy cows. We’ve since transported over 60,000 ducklings and 190,000 pounds of fresh produce on cargo charter flights between Guyana, Toronto and Trinidad. Here are some pics. https://t.co/B0GYHQIy3C

Love is… chilling and toasting with coconuts 🥥 while basking in the warm sunshine ☀️ in a tropical paradise 🌴 

Be inspired to book your flight ✈️ to spark the Caribbean love 💕 

#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean #caribbeanlove 

📽️Credit: @wani_cakes - Caribbean Airlines FA https://t.co/6BbAMgndrT
